movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (Extended)
movies.strong-points: Bilbo dissapearing in his own birthday party; All characters are amazing; Great story; Strider carrying 4 Hobbits in his back all the way; Frodo is brave; "You shall not pass" best scene; Legolas we love you
movies.weak-points: Frodo and Sam get to Mordor's border by the end of the movie. How come there are 2 more movies?; Rewatching it, I see how everything is poorly explained; Gandalf dies, can't believe it. Now, they're never gonna make it.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (Extended)
movies.strong-points: Gollum finally appears and it's good CG even now; Gandalf resurrects; Frodo finds out he's nothing without Sam; The battle of Helm's Deeps is amazing;
movies.weak-points: Frodo is an idiot, but we know it's because of the Ring ok?; Frodo and Sam manage to regress in Mordor's path; Frodo, please stop believing Gollum, I beg you.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (Extended)
movies.strong-points: Finally understood that Helm's Deep and Minas Tirith are different places; The Fellowship of the Ring finally succeeds. The Ring is destroyed!; Faramir is saved; The lady kills a fucking Nazgul and Witch-King; Great battle; Sam literally carries Frodo to the volcano, best character; I love the Smeagol transformation scene
movies.weak-points: Frodo goes to Valinor. Not necessary. I wanted him to marry Sam and be happily ever after.

tv-shows.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
tv-shows.strong-points: Galadriel does not die even against a volcano; Halbrand is an amazing name and he's so cool; You will not believe which character is Sauron; Main Hobbit has algae name. Claps for Nori; Wordart is back (and thanks I needed that explanation); Great pacing; Elrond is beautiful
tv-shows.weak-points: LOTR requires a fucking degree to catch up to the story. I did not recall any characters from the movies. Had to rewatch the movies to get context; Wanna see the productors make Elrond decay that much until Sauron's death
